Terms of UseMarch 1 2021 10:44pm • Est. Read Time: 12 MINBODYBUILDING.COM TERMS OF USE

These Terms of Use ("Terms") govern all use of Bodybuilding.com ("Bodybuilding.com"). Bodybuilding.com includes bodybuilding.com, bodyspace.bodybuilding.com, forum.bodybuilding.com and other sites owned or operated (“Site”) Bodybuilding.com. By using and accessing the Site, you agree to these Terms, the Privacy Policy, other policies, and all applicable laws and regulations. Customers in the EU are subject to the EU Conditions of Use.


If any Bodybuilding.com services and/or applications have additional terms and conditions, privacy statements, or other policies ("Separate Terms"), then those Separate Terms shall apply in connection with your use of that Bodybuilding.com service and/or site. To the extent there is a direct conflict between the Separate Terms and these Terms, the Separate Terms shall govern. If you do not want to be bound by these Terms, do not use the Site.

 

Bodybuilding.com is primarily an online retailer of third-party brands and all product information is provided by the brand owner and is for information purposes only. Actual product packaging may contain different information than is displayed on our site. DO NOT RELY SOLELY ON THIS INFORMATION. ALWAYS READ LABELS, WARNINGS AND FOLLOW DIRECTIONS ON THE PRODUCT LABEL BEFORE USE. YOU HEREBY WAIVE ANY LIABILITY AGAINST BODYBUILDING.COM FOR INACCURACIES OR MISSTATEMENTS RELATED TO PRODUCTS MANUFACTURED BY THIRD PARTIES.

 

Bodybuilding.com reserves the right to suspend or terminate your account and your ability to use the Site or portion thereof for failure to comply with these Terms or any Separate Terms related to a service, for infringing copyright, or for any other reason at Bodybuilding.com’s reasonable discretion. You are solely responsible for the content of your computer and any transmissions you make when using the Site.

 

  1. CHANGES IN TERMS

Bodybuilding.com has the sole right at any time and without prior notice to revise these Terms. Bodybuilding.com will post changes on the Site and it is your responsibility to review these Terms and any modifications.

 

  1. TERMINATION

Bodybuilding.com has the right at any time and without prior notice to terminate some or all of Bodybuilding.com services, any feature or portion thereof, or any products or services offered, and to terminate your right to access or use Bodybuilding.com services or any feature or portion thereof.

 

  1. COMPLIANCE WITH LAWS

You agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations regarding your use of the Site. You must be at least 13 years old to use Bodybuilding.com. See the Safety of Minors section of the Privacy Policy.

 

  1. CONTENT

The text, images, photographs, graphics, videos, logos, illustrations, descriptions, data, and other material on the Site, as well as the selection, assembly, and arrangement thereof, are referred to collectively as the "Content".

 

The Content may contain errors, omissions, or may be out of date. Bodybuilding.com may change, delete, or update Content at any time. The Content is provided for informational and/or entertainment purposes only and is not binding on Bodybuilding.com.

 

All content, logos, graphics, pages, scripts, and service names included in or made available through any Site are subject to trade dress, trademarks, service marks, and/or copyright law and other laws that protect intellectual property in the U.S. and other countries. Bodybuilding.com's intellectual property may not be used without Bodybuilding.com's express written permission. All other trademarks and service marks not owned by Bodybuilding.com that appear in any Site are the property of their respective owners, who may or may not be affiliated with, connected to, or sponsored by Bodybuilding.com.

 

You may view and use the Content for your personal information and for ordering and for no other purpose. Bodybuilding.com does not grant to you or any person any right to use, reproduce, copy, modify, transmit, display, publish, sell, license, create derivative works, publicly perform, or distribute by any means, method, or process whatsoever, now known or hereafter developed, any of the Content on or transmitted through the Site.

 

  1. NOTICE AND PROCEDURE FOR ADDRESSING INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY CONCERNS

If you have any concerns related to intellectual property on the site, please provide the Bodybuilding.com copyright agent the following:

    • An electronic or physical signature of the person authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the copyright or other intellectual property interest;
    • A description of the copyrighted work or other intellectual property at issue;
    • The specific location of the material giving rise to the concern on the Site;
    • Your address, telephone number, facsimile number, and email address;
    • A statement by you that you have a good faith belief that the disputed use is not authorized by the copyright or other intellectual property owner, its agent, or the law;
    • A statement by you, under penalty of perjury, that the above information in your Notice is accurate and that you are the copyright or other intellectual property owner or are authorized to act on behalf of the copyright or other intellectual property owner.

 

Notification should be sent to:

Designated Agent: Krystal Saab, General Counsel, 5777 N Meeker Ave, Boise, Idaho 83713, USA. +1 (208) 377-3326. legal@bodybuilding.com

  1. PRODUCT REVIEWS

Product reviews appearing on the Site are prepared by third-parties (including, but not limited to, review pages, message boards, forums, text files, chats, etc.). Bodybuilding.com has not determined whether a specific reviewer's experience is what an average or typical customer may expect to achieve and should not be construed as advice from Bodybuilding.com or any of its affiliates.

  1. ACCOUNTS

Some services on the Site permit or require you to create an account to participate or to secure additional benefits. You agree to provide, maintain and update true, accurate, current and complete information about yourself as prompted by our registration processes. You shall not impersonate any person or entity or misrepresent your identity or affiliation with any person or entity, including using another person's username, password or other account information, or another person's name, likeness, voice, image or photograph. You also agree to promptly notify Bodybuilding.com at webmaster@bodybuilding.com of any unauthorized use of your username, password, other account information, or any other breach of security involving or relating to the Site.

  1. USER CONTENT

The Site allows you to post content, including, but not limited to, photos, reviews, ideas, suggestions, links, forum posts and other materials. Anything that you post or otherwise make available on or in connection with the Site is referred to as “User Content.” User Content is non-confidential, non-proprietary, and may be used by Bodybuilding.com, Bodybuilding.com vendors, or their affiliates for any purpose without further permission, consent, payment, or other consideration, unless prohibited by law. You agree that as a condition of permitting you to submit User Content, you grant Bodybuilding.com, Bodybuilding.com's affiliates, and any sub-licensees, subject to the Privacy Policy, a non-exclusive, irrevocable, royalty-free, worldwide, fully sub-licensable, perpetual right and license to use, copy, publicly perform, digitally perform, publicly display, republish and distribute User Content, including the use of your name, alias, and any other information (provided by you), and to prepare derivative works based on, or incorporate into other works, User Content, with or without attribution. You represent and warrant that any User Content is in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations, and it is not composed of and does not contain viruses, solicitations, or any form of spam. Your submission of User Content constitutes an agreement that you will defend, indemnify, and hold Bodybuilding.com harmless for all claims resulting from User Content you supply. 

Bodybuilding.com is not responsible for, and does not endorse the opinions, information, advice or recommendations in User Content and specifically disclaims all liability in connection therewith.

 

Bodybuilding.com reserves the right to modify, review, delete and refuse to post User Content for any reason.

  1. PUBLIC FORUMS AND COMMUNICATION

"Forum" means an area, site or feature offered as part of a Site that allows users to distribute User Content for viewing by Site users, including, but not limited to, a chat area, message board, messaging, social community environment, profile page, blog, and e-mail function. .  .   

You acknowledge that Forums and features offered therein are for public and not private communications, and you have no expectation of privacy with regard to any User Content. You further agree that your communications will comply with all rules set forth in section 10 below. .  .  .  .  

Bodybuilding.com cannot guarantee the security of any User Content and you make such disclosures at your own risk. Bodybuilding.com has no duty to monitor any Forum.  .  .   

  1. RULES OF CONDUCT

By using the Site, you agree that you will not submit any User Content that: (a) is defamatory, abusive, harassing, threatening, or an invasion of a right of privacy. (b) is bigoted, hateful, or racially or otherwise offensive. (c) is violent, vulgar, obscene, pornographic or otherwise sexually explicit. or (d) otherwise harms or can reasonably be expected to harm any person or entity. (e) is illegal or encourages or advocates illegal activity or the discussion of illegal activities with the intent to commit them, including User Content that is or represents an attempt to engage in child pornography, stalking, sexual assault, suicide, fraud, trafficking in obscene or stolen material, drug dealing and/or drug abuse, harassment, theft, or conspiracy to commit any criminal activity. (f) infringes or violates any right of a third party. (g) is commercial, business-related or advertises or offers to sell any products, services or otherwise (whether or not for profit), or solicits others (including solicitations for contributions or donations) unless specifically authorized by Bodybuilding.com. (h) contains a virus or other harmful component, or otherwise tampers with, impairs or damages the Site or any connected network, or otherwise interferes with any person or entity's use or enjoyment of the Site. (i) violates any specific restrictions applicable to a Forum, including its age restrictions and procedures. or (j) is antisocial, disruptive, or destructive, including flaming, spamming, flooding, trolling, and griefing as those terms are commonly understood and used on the internet. Bodybuilding.com shall be held harmless from any User Content. .  .  .  .  .   

  1. DISCLAIMER AND LIMITATION OF LIABILITY AS TO THE BODYBUILDING.COM.COM SITE AND CONTENT

UNLESS PROHIBITED BY APPLICABLE LAW, BODYBUILDING.COM MAKES NO WARRANTIES OR REPRESENTATIONS WHATSOEVER WITH RESPECT TO BODYBUILDING.COM, ANY LINKED SITE OR ITS CONTENT, INCLUDING THE AVAILABILITY OF ANY SITE OR THE CONTENT, INFORMATION, AND MATERIALS ON IT OR THE ACCURACY, COMPLETENESS, OR TIMELINESS OF THAT CONTENT, INFORMATION, AND MATERIALS. BODYBUILDING.COM ALSO DOES NOT WARRANT OR REPRESENT THAT YOUR ACCESS TO OR USE OF BODYBUILDING.COM OR ANY LINKED SITE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED OR FREE OF ERRORS OR OMISSIONS, THAT DEFECTS WILL BE CORRECTED, OR THAT BODYBUILDING.COM OR ANY LINKED SITE IS FREE OF COMPUTER VIRUSES OR OTHER HARMFUL COMPONENTS. WITHOUT LIMITING THE FOREGOING, ALL CONTENT PROVIDED ON OR THROUGH BODYBUILDING.COM IS PROVIDED TO USERS "AS IS," WITH NO WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE, NON-INFRINGEMENT, SECURITY, OR ACCURACY. THE "AS IS" CONDITION OF CONTENT IS EXPRESSLY MADE A CONDITION OF ANY TRANSACTION ARISING THROUGH OR AS A RESULT OF THE BODYBUILDING.COM SERVICES.

UNLESS PROHIBITED BY APPLICABLE LAW, BODYBUILDING.COM SHALL NOT, UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES, BE LIABLE TO YOU FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, SPECIAL, OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH USE OF THE APPLICATION, WHETHER BASED ON BREACH OF CONTRACT, BREACH OF WARRANTY, TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE, PRODUCT LIABILITY OR OTHERWISE), OR ANY OTHER PECUNIARY LOSS, WHETHER OR NOT BODYBUILDING.COM HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES. UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES SHALL BODYBUILDING.COM BE LIABLE TO YOU FOR ANY AMOUNT.

  1. ELECTRONIC COMMUNICATION

By using the Site you consent to receive communications from Bodybuilding.com electronically. Bodybuilding.com will communicate with you by email or by posting notices on the Site. You agree that all notices, disclosures, agreements and other communications that Bodybuilding.com provides electronically satisfies any legal requirement that such communications be in writing.

  1. LINKED THIRD PARTY SITES

Links to other websites operated by third parties or as on Site advertisements, including Bodybuilding.com vendors, do not constitute sponsorship, endorsement, or approval by Bodybuilding.com of the content, policies, or practices of such linked sites. Bodybuilding.com does not operate, control, or maintain linked sites and is not responsible for their availability, content, security, policies, or practices. Links to other sites are accessed at your own risk.

  1. PRICES. ORDERS

All purchases and orders are subject to the Conditions of Sale. .  .  

Manufacturer Suggested Retail Price (“MSRP”) is provided by the manufacturer and is the manufacturer's representation of value. Sales may or may not be made at this price. This price does not necessarily represent the prevailing retail price in every community, and may not represent the price at which Bodybuilding.com sells the product. .  .  .  .  

Bodybuilding.com may add shipping and handling fees and applicable sales/use or value added tax. Bodybuilding.com reserves the right without prior notice to discontinue or change specifications and prices on products and services offered through Bodybuilding.com. 

Bodybuilding.com reserves the right at any time after receipt of your order to accept or decline your order, or any portion thereof, even after your receipt of an order confirmation from Bodybuilding.com, for any reason. Bodybuilding.com reserves the right to limit the order quantity on any item and to refuse service to any customer without prior notification. .  

In the event that a product or service is listed at an incorrect price due to supplier pricing information or typographical error, Bodybuilding.com shall have the right to refuse or cancel orders placed for the product or service listed at the incorrect price, regardless of whether the order has been confirmed and your payment method charged. If you already have been charged for the purchase and your order is canceled, Bodybuilding.com shall promptly issue a credit to your method of payment in the amount of the incorrect price.

The risk of loss and title for all products purchased by you and shipped by Bodybuilding.com pass to you upon Bodybuilding.com's delivery to the carrier for shipment. The risk of loss and title for all products purchased by you and shipped directly by one of Bodybuilding.com's vendors pass from such vendor to you upon such vendor's delivery to the carrier for shipment. .  .  .  .  .   

  1. TRANSPARENCY IN SUPPLY CHAIN DISCLOSURE

The state of California requires the following disclosure statement as of January 1, 2012, pursuant to the "Transparency in Supply Chain Act of 2010". .  .  .  .  .   

http://www.leginfo.ca.gov/pub/09-10/bill/sen/sb_0651-0700/sb_657_bill_20100930_chaptered.pdf

Most nutritional supplements sold by Bodybuilding.com are manufactured in the U.S., in accordance with applicable U.S. labor laws. Some ingredients are sourced from foreign countries but U.S. manufacturers are required (per Good Manufacturing Practices outlined at 21 C.F.R. 111.260) to test ingredients for purity prior to use in nutritional supplements. .  .  

Bodybuilding.com is committed to conducting business in compliance with applicable law. Bodybuilding.com exhibits and promotes the highest standards of honest and ethical conduct in our dealings. Bodybuilding.com employees are expected to conduct themselves with honesty and integrity, and we recognize the important role manufacturers, ingredient suppliers and business partners play in helping us fulfill our commitment to ethical and responsible retailing. .  .  

For purposes of this disclosure, Bodybuilding.com is a retailer not a manufacturer, but Bodybuilding.com is not aware of any unethical or illegal labor practices in connection with any ingredient sourced outside the U.S. We do not audit and assess each product manufacturer's sourcing practice. Bodybuilding.com is aware of the importance of ethical sourcing, and if Bodybuilding.com identifies a product manufacturer who does not meet Bodybuilding.com's expectations (including avoiding ingredients manufactured with trafficked labor), Bodybuilding.com will work with them to take corrective action or discontinue selling products manufactured by them. .   

  1. MOBILE SERVICES

The Site may include certain services that are available to you via your mobile phone or other mobile device if you have subscribed to them, including the ability to use your mobile device to place orders, receive and reply to messages from Bodybuilding.com, and access certain other features. Mobile devices and/or mobile apps may be subject to additional fees and/or terms and conditions. .  .  .   

  1. DISCLAIMER AND LIMITATION OF LIABILITY

Bodybuilding.com provides the Site (including all Content) “as is” without warranty of any kind, whether express or implied. You are solely responsible for damage that results from the use of the Site including, but not limited to, damage to your computer system or loss of data.

BODYBUILDING.COM SPECIFICALLY DISCLAIMS ANY AND ALL WARRANTIES AND CONDITIONS OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, SECURITY, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT, AND ANY WARRANTIES ARISING OUT OF COURSE OF DEALING OR USAGE OF TRADE. .  .  .   

BODYBUILDING.COM SHALL NOT BE LIABLE TO YOU OR ANY OTHER PERSON OR ENTITY FOR DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES INCLUDING LOST PROFITS, PERSONAL INJURY (INCLUDING DEATH) AND PROPERTY DAMAGE OF ANY NATURE WHATSOEVER. IN NO EVENT SHALL OUR TOTAL LIABILITY TO YOU FOR ALL DAMAGES AND LOSSES FOR ANY CAUSE OF ACTION EXCEED THE AMOUNT PAID BY YOU, OR $100 (WHICHEVER IS LESS). 

  1. HOLD HARMLESS AND INDEMNITY

To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, you agree to hold harmless and indemnify Bodybuilding.com, its parent company, and their respective subsidiaries, affiliates, officers, agents, licensors, co-branders or other partners, and employees from and against any third-party claim arising from or in any way related to your use of the Site, including any liability or expense arising from all claims, losses, damages (actual and/or consequential), suits, judgments, litigation costs and attorneys' fees, of every kind and nature. 

  1. DISPUTE RESOLUTION

By using the Site, you agree that all disputes, claims, or causes of action arising from or related to your use of the Site will be resolved through binding arbitration in Boise, Idaho in accordance with the rules of the American Arbitration Association. ARBITRATION OF A DISPUTE, CLAIM OR CAUSE OF ACTION SHALL BE IN AN INDIVIDUAL CAPACITY AND NOT AS A PLAINTIFF OR CLASS MEMBER IN ANY PURPORTED CLASS OR REPRESENTATIVE PROCEEDING. .  .  .  .  

These Terms of Use shall be construed in accordance with the laws of the state of Idaho, without giving effect to any choice or conflict of law provision. You agree to jurisdiction in Idaho and you will initiate any claim in connection with use of the Site or these Terms of Use in Ada County, Idaho.

 

Nothing in this Section shall prevent Bodybuilding.com from seeking injunctive or other equitable relief from the courts for matters related to data security, intellectual property, or unauthorized access to the Site.

  1. GENERAL TERMS
  • Entire Agreement/Severability. These Terms of Use, together with the App Terms, Privacy Policy, and Conditions of Sale and any amendments and any additional agreements you may enter into with Bodybuilding.com, shall constitute the entire agreement between you and Bodybuilding.com. If any provision of these Terms of Use is deemed invalid, that provision will be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary, and the remaining provisions of these Terms of Use will remain in full force and effect.
  • No Waiver. No waiver of any term of these Terms of Use shall be deemed a further or continuing waiver of such term or any other term, and Bodybuilding.com's failure to assert any right or provision under these Terms of Use shall not constitute a waiver of such right or provision.
  • Defined Words. Any capitalized words used herein and not otherwise defined are defined in Bodybuilding.com's Conditions of Sale, App Terms, or Privacy Policy, or the applicable policy.

Bodyfit Terms and ConditionsJanuary 29 2021 6:48pm • Est. Read Time: 11 MIN

BODYFIT BY BODYBUILDING.COM TERMS OF USE AND SUBSCRIBER AGREEMENT

These Terms of Use and Subscriber Agreement (“Terms”) governs your use of digital products and services from Bodybuilding.com and access to Bodybuilding.com’s BodyFit program (“BodyFit”) unless other terms and conditions expressly govern.

IF YOU CHOOSE TO ENROLL IN A BODYFIT MEMBERSHIP, THE MEMBERSHIP, INCLUDING MEMBERSHIP FEES, WILL AUTOMATICALLY RENEW. PLEASE READ THESE TERMS CAREFULLY BEFORE COMPLETING A PURCHASE OF A BODYFIT AUTO-RENEWING MEMBERSHIP SERVICE. IF YOU ENROLL IN BODYFIT, YOU MUST EXPRESSLY ACCEPT THESE TERMS, CONDITIONS, LIMITATIONS, AND REQUIREMENTS, INCLUDING THE ARBITRATION AGREEMENT AND CLASS ACTION WAIVER DESCRIBED BELOW TO RESOLVE ANY DISPUTES WITH BODYBUILDING.COM RELATED TO BODYFIT OR YOUR PAID MEMBERSHIP.

The following terms and conditions ("Terms") apply to your participation in the BodyFit program. These Terms are between you and Vitalize, LLC d/b/a Bodybuilding.com and its affiliates (“Bodybuilding.com” or “us”) and govern our respective rights and obligations.

Please note that your use of the Bodybuilding.com website and mobile applications and membership in the BodyFit program are also governed by other terms and conditions, including your Consent Agreement with Bodybuilding.com for stored payment credentials (which can be found in the “My Account” section of our website), Bodybuilding.com’s Terms of Use and Privacy Policy, as well as any other applicable terms, conditions, limitations, promotional offers, and requirements on the Bodybuilding.com website or mobile applications, all of which (as changed over time) are incorporated into these Terms and constitute the entire agreement between you and Bodybuilding.com related to your BodyFit program membership.

1.0  .   CHANGES TO THE TERMS

We may, in our sole discretion, change these Terms or any aspect of the BodyFit program at any time and for any reason, including any provision that is found invalid, void, or unenforceable. When we make material changes to these Terms, we’ll provide you with notice as appropriate under the circumstances, for example, by displaying a prominent notice within the service or by sending you an e-mail. Changes to Paid Membership price changes will be communicated to you via email in accordance with the section titled “Price Changes.” Please make sure you read any notice carefully. YOUR CONTINUED MEMBERSHIP AFTER WE CHANGE THESE TERMS CONSTITUTES YOUR ACCEPTANCE OF THE CHANGES. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE TO ANY CHANGES, YOU MUST CANCEL YOUR MEMBERSHIP. IF YOU RECEIVED A TRIAL OR PAID MEMBERSHIP THROUGH A THIRD PARTY, SUCH AS THE APP STORE OR GOOGLE PLAY STORE, YOU MUST CANCEL YOUR MEMBERSHIP THROUGH SUCH THIRD PARTY.

2.0  .   MEMBERSHIP OPTIONS

You can always find a description of our membership options on our website, and we will explain what membership options are available to you when you create a Bodybuilding.com and/or BodyFit account.

Certain BodyFit memberships are provided free-of-charge, which are referred to in these Terms as the “Free Membership.” Other BodyFit memberships require payment before you can access them, and are referred to in these Terms as the “Paid Memberships.” We may also offer special promotional plans, memberships, or services, including offering third-party products and services in conjunction with or through the BodyFit program. We are not responsible for the products and services provided by third parties (i.e., any party that is not Bodybuilding.com). We reserve the right to modify, terminate, or otherwise amend our offered membership plans and promotional offerings at any time in accordance with these Terms.

 .  . 2.1  .   Paid Membership Options.

Bodybuilding.com offers the following Paid Membership options and corresponding Paid Membership benefits:


BodyFit MonthlyBodyFit AnnualPaid Membership fee$6.99 USD billed monthly
$47.99 USD billed annuallyAccess to 2,500+ premium workout articles✔✔Access to Bodybuilding.com’s exercise database containing 3,500+ instructional videos✔✔Access to 60+ premium workout plans✔✔Access to Bodybuilding.com’s world- class workout tracking app✔✔Discount in store
see section 2.3 for details10%10%Free domestic shipping in contiguous United States
see section 2.3 for details✔✔Free 7-day trial period
see section 3.0 for details✔✔

The Paid Membership fees above exclude any offers, promotions, taxes/fees, or “grandfathered” subscriptions (i.e., subscriptions which existed prior to certain price increases).

We may offer a number of different membership plans, including special promotional plans or membership models. Some membership plans may have differing conditions and limitations, which will be disclosed at your sign-up or in other communications made available to you. You can find specific details regarding your BodyFit Membership by visiting “My Account” on our website at www.bodybuilding.com.

The monthly, annual, and any promotional membership fees will be referred to in these terms, collectively, as the “membership fee(s).” Bodybuilding.com reserves the right to charge and process any membership fees in US dollars. Bodybuilding.com may offer different membership terms to different clients, and the fees for membership may vary. Additionally, prices may vary based on exchange rates and your financial institution. Bodybuilding.com does not charge currency exchange fees, however, your financial institution may. Please consult with your financial institution for more information. The BodyFit membership fee is non-refundable except as expressly set forth below. Taxes may apply to the membership fee. At the time of your membership renewal, we may increase the membership fee in our sole discretion but with prior notice to you. If you do not want to accept the increased membership fee, you may cancel the renewal of your BodyFit Membership.

The BodyFit Memberships are sold to you by Vitalize, LLC d/b/a Bodybuilding.com, a Delaware limited liability company, with its physical address at 5777 N. Meeker Ave., Boise, Idaho 83713, USA.

 .  . 2.2  .   In-App Purchase of Memberships.

If you purchase your Paid Membership through a Bodybuilding.com mobile application in either the Google Play Store or Apple App Store, in addition to these Terms, your Paid Membership will be governed by the applicable store’s subscription terms. All in-app Paid Memberships will automatically renew until you choose to cancel them. In-app Paid Memberships cannot be managed via your Bodybuilding.com BodyFit account. All in-app Paid Memberships can be managed via your Google and/or Apple account settings.

 .  . 2.3  .   BodyFit Store Discount &. Free Shipping Benefits.

All BodyFit members will be rewarded with ten-percent (10%) off all orders, before taxes and shipping fees, in Bodybuilding.com’s online store. Additionally, all BodyFit members receive free domestic economy shipping on all orders, excluding shipments to Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico, P.O. Boxes, and/or APO/FPO addresses, and any drop ship products. For BodyFit monthly membership plan enrollees who elect to upgrade to the annual membership plan, membership benefits will be modified at the subsequent renewal date.

These benefits may be stacked with applicable discount/coupon codes. We may, in our sole discretion, change and/or eliminate these membership benefits for any reason, including to prevent abuse or in connection with large bulk orders. For combinations with other offers, restrictions may apply. If you choose to cancel your participation in BodyFit, your membership benefits will immediately end after expiration of the applicable Paid Membership period.

3.0  .   FREE TRIALS

Bodybuilding.com offers a free seven-day trial (“Free Trial”) to the BodyFit program, which entitles you to access Bodybuilding.com’s BodyFit service for a period of seven (7) days from the moment that you activate such trial period by submitting your payment details (“Free Trial Period”). By submitting your payment details, you (a) consent to Bodybuilding.com using your payment details in accordance with our Privacy Policy and credit card consent agreement and (b) acknowledge and agree to these Terms. AFTER THE FREE TRIAL PERIOD EXPIRES, YOUR ACCOUNT WILL AUTOMATICALLY ROLL OVER TO EITHER: (1) A MONTHLY PAID MEMBERSHIP WITH BODYFIT, OR (2) AN ANNUAL PAID MEMBERSHIP WITH BODYFIT, depending on which Paid Membership model you choose at the point of signing up for a Free Trial. To view the applicable membership price and end date of your Free Trial Period, visit the “My Account” section on our website at www.bodybuilding.com.

YOU MUST CANCEL YOUR FREE TRIAL MEMBERSHIP PRIOR TO THE EXPIRATION OF THE FREE TRIAL PERIOD TO AVOID BEING CHARGED AUTOMATICALLY FOR A FULL PAID MEMBERSHIP WHICH WILL THEN BE SUBJECT TO AUTO-RENEWAL. You will receive an email from Bodybuilding.com (sent to the email address we have on file) prior to the end of the Free Trial with either the annual or monthly membership fees due. the frequency of future payments. the truncated payment method to be charged. and applicable cancellation and refund policies.

Customers are only entitled to one (1) Free Trial per BodyFit program subscription in any twelve (12) month period. Bodybuilding.com reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to withdraw or to modify this Free Trial offer at any time without prior notice and with no liability.

4.0  .   BILLING AND CANCELLATION

 .  . 4.1.  .   Billing Cycle. The membership fee for the BodyFit Paid Membership you enroll in and any other charges you may incur in connection with your use of the BodyFit program, such as taxes and possible transaction fees, will be charged to your Payment Method (defined below) on the specific billing date indicated on your “My Account” page. The length of your billing cycle will depend on the type of subscription that you choose when you sign up for the program. Bodybuilding.com offers the following payment cadences for its Paid Memberships (options vary by membership type):

Membership TermPayment CadenceMonthlyMembership fee is auto-renewed and billed every thirty (30) days at the then-applicable monthly membership fee.AnnualMembership fee is auto-renewed and billed every 365 days at the then-applicable annual membership fee.

Membership fees are fully earned upon payment. In some cases, your payment date may change, for example if your Payment Method has not successfully settled or if your paid membership began on a day not contained in a given month. Visit your “My Account” page to see your next payment date and membership fee.

 .  . 4.2.  .   Payment Methods. To utilize the BodyFit platform and services, you must provide one or more Payment Methods. "Payment Method" means a current, valid, accepted method of payment (such as a credit or debit card), as may be updated from time to time and which may include payment through your account with a third party. You can update your Payment Methods by going to your "My Account" page. We may also update your Payment Methods using information provided by the payment service providers. Following any update, you authorize us to continue to charge the applicable Payment Method(s). You remain responsible for any uncollected amounts. If a payment is not successfully settled, due to expiration, insufficient funds, or otherwise, and you do not cancel your Paid Membership, we may suspend your access to the BodyFit platform and services until we have successfully charged a valid Payment Method. For some Payment Methods, the issuer may charge you certain fees, such as foreign transaction fees or other fees relating to the processing of your Payment Method. Check with your Payment Method service provider for details.

 .  . 4.3.  .   Updating Payment Methods. You can update your Payment Method(s) by going to the “My Account” page. We may also update your Payment Methods using information provided by the payment service providers. Following any update, you authorize us to continue to charge the applicable Payment Method(s).

 .  . 4.4.  .   Cancellation. If you wish to cancel your participation in the BodyFit Paid Membership program, you may cancel at any time before your Paid Membership renewal date by visiting your “My Account” page and following the instructions for cancellation, by calling 1-866-236-8417, or by sending an email to bodyfit@bodybuilding.com. If your membership was purchased through a Bodybuilding.com mobile application in either the Apple App Store or the Google Play Store, please refer to the applicable store’s terms for Paid Membership management and cancellation or adjust your membership preferences in your Google and/or Apple account settings you used to initially purchase the Paid Membership. If you cancel, you will not be charged on your renewal date but your membership will continue until your renewal date. YOU MUST AFFIRMATIVELY CANCEL YOUR PAID MEMBERSHIP BY THE RENEWAL DATE OR YOUR MEMBERSHIP WILL AUTOMATICALLY RENEW AND THE APPLICABLE PAYMENT METHOD YOU PROVIDED TO US AT THE TIME OF YOUR INITIAL PURCHASE AND ENROLLMENT IN OUR PROGRAM WILL BE CHARGED.

 .  . 4.5.  .   Price Changes. When you purchase a Paid Membership, you will initially be charged at the rate applicable at the time of your agreement to subscribe. If the price of the Paid Membership increases later, Bodybuilding.com will notify you via the email address with which you enrolled in the BodyFit program. The increase will apply to the next payment due from you after the notice, provided that you have been given at least thirty (30) days’ prior notice before the charge is made. If you are given less than thirty (30) days’ prior notice, the price increase will not apply until the first payment date following expiration of the thirty (30) day period after your receipt of the price increase notification.

 .  . 4.6.  .   Non-Refundable Fee. The membership fees are pre-paid in full on a monthly or annual basis and are non-refundable once paid. There is no pro-rata refund if the membership is cancelled prior to the end of the term except if offered in our sole discretion. If you are located in the EU, by purchasing a BodyFit Paid Membership, you expressly waive your right to cancel your membership within the fourteen (14) day right-to-cancel under the Consumer Rights Directive and similar country-specific regulations, such as the UK Consumer Rights Act.

5.0  .   TERMINATION BY BODYBUILDING.COM

We may terminate or suspend your BodyFit membership in our sole discretion for any reason without notice. We will not give a refund for termination related to conduct that we determine, in our discretion, violates these Terms or any applicable law, involves fraud or misuse of the BodyFit program, or is harmful to our interests or to another user. Our failure to insist upon or enforce strict compliance with these Terms will not constitute a waiver of any of our rights.

6.0  .   CONSENT TO RECEIVE COMMUNICATIONS

By submitting an application for membership to the BodyFit program, you agree (or, if you are a minor, your parent or legal guardian must agree) to receive advertising, marketing materials, and other communications from Bodybuilding.com at the e-mail address with which you created your BodyFit account. By signing up to join the BodyFit program, you will automatically be subscribed to receive BodyFit program emails. You may unsubscribe from receiving marketing emails at any time by clicking the “unsubscribe” link contained in the email footer or by contacting our Customer Service department by e-mailing bodyfit@bodybuilding.com or by calling 1-866-236-8417.

7.0  .   DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES AND LIMITATION OF LIABILITY

THE BODYFIT PROGRAM AND ALL CONTENT AND SOFTWARE ASSOCIATED WITH IT, OR ANY OTHER FEATURES OR FUNCTIONALITIES ASSOCIATED WITH THE BODYFIT PROGRAM, ARE PROVIDED “AS IS” AND “AS AVAILABLE” WITH ALL FAULTS AND WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND. BODYBUILDING.COM DOES NOT GUARANTEE, REPRESENT, OR WARRANT THAT YOUR USE OF THE BODYFIT PROGRAM OR SERVICE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE.

IN ADDITION TO OTHER LIMITATIONS AND EXCLUSIONS IN BODYBUILDING.COM’S TERMS OF USE AND CONDITIONS OF SALE, YOU AGREE THAT NEITHER WE NOR OUR DIRECTORS, OFFICERS, EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, PARENT COMPANY, SUBSIDIARIES, JOINT VENTURERS, THIRD-PARTY SERVICE PROVIDERS, OR OTHER REPRESENTATIVES SHALL BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, OR ANY OTHER DAMAGES OF ANY KIND, ARISING OUT OF OR RELATED TO THE BODYFIT PROGRAM OR YOUR PAID MEMBERSHIP. OUR TOTAL LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, WARRANTY, TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE), OR OTHERWISE, WILL NOT EXCEED THE AMOUNT OF THE LAST MEMBERSHIP FEE YOU PAID. THESE EXCLUSIONS AND LIMITATIONS OF LIABILITY WILL APPLY TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW AND WILL SURVIVE CANCELLATION OR TERMINATION OF YOUR PAID OR FREE MEMBERSHIP. CERTAIN STATE LAWS DO NOT ALLOW THE EXCLUSION OR LIMITATION OF CERTAIN DAMAGES. IF THESE LAWS APPLY TO YOU, SOME OR ALL OF THE ABOVE EXCLUSIONS OR LIMITATIONS MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU, AND YOU MIGHT HAVE ADDITIONAL RIGHTS.

8.0  .   DISPUTE RESOLUTION

If a dispute should arise between you and Bodybuilding.com, we want to provide you with a resolution that is efficient and cost effective by using our customer service team. Almost all disputes can be resolved to the customer’s satisfaction by using our customer service, reachable by calling 1-866-236-8417 or by sending an email to bodyfit@bodybuilding.com.

If your dispute cannot be resolved using our customer service team, these Terms describe how we will proceed with the resolution of the dispute.

THE FOLLOWING PROVISIONS RELATE TO DISPUTES, CLAIMS, AND CLASS ACTIONS. IT IS IMPORTANT THAT YOU READ THESE PROVISIONS CAREFULLY BEFORE ACCEPTING THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS.

 .  . 8.1  .   Binding Arbitration

ANY CLAIM OR DISPUTE RELATING IN ANY WAY TO YOUR USE OF THE BODYBUILDING.COM BODYFIT PROGRAM OR THESE TERMS SHALL BE SUBMITTED TO CONFIDENTIAL BINDING ARBITRATION. ARBITRATION REMOVES YOUR RIGHT TO LITIGATE A CLAIM IN COURT OR TO HAVE A JURY TRIAL ON THAT CLAIM. OTHER RIGHTS THAT YOU WOULD HAVE IN COURT MAY NOT BE AVAILABLE IN ARBITRATION. IT IS IMPORTANT THAT YOU READ THIS PROVISION CAREFULLY BEFORE ACCEPTING THESE TERMS. The arbitration will be administered by the American Arbitration Association (“AAA”) under its then-current arbitration rules. If any AAA rule conflicts with these Terms, these Terms shall control. You can obtain procedures, rules, and fee information from the AAA at www.adr.org or 1-800-778-7879. Any participatory arbitration hearing that you attend shall take place in Boise, Idaho and Idaho law will apply during the arbitration. The judgment upon the award rendered by the arbitrator shall be final and binding and may be entered in any court of competent jurisdiction. Unless inconsistent with applicable law, each party shall bear the expense of their respective attorneys’, experts’ and witness fees, regardless of which party prevails in the arbitration.

 .  . 8.2  .   No Class Actions

TO THE EXTENT ALLOWED BY LAW, WE EACH WAIVE ANY RIGHT TO PURSUE DISPUTES ON A CONSOLIDATED OR CLASSWIDE BASIS. THAT IS, TO EITHER JOIN A CLAIM WITH THE CLAIM OF ANY OTHER PERSON OR ENTITY, OR ASSERT A CLAIM IN A REPRESENTATIVE CAPACITY ON BEHALF OF ANYONE ELSE IN ANY LAWSUIT, ARBITRATION, OR OTHER PROCEEDING. YOU UNDERSTAND THAT BY AGREEING TO THIS CLASS ACTION WAIVER, YOU MAY ONLY BRING CLAIMS AGAINST BODYBUILDING.COM IN AN INDIVIDUAL CAPACITY IN ACCORDANCE WITH THIS SECTION 8.0 AND NOT AS A PLAINTIFF OR CLASS MEMBER IN ANY PURPORTED CLASS ACTION OR REPRESENTATIVE PROCEEDING.

Terms Last Updated: November 2, 2020
